tagline.title: BALI DENPASAR TANAH LOT TOUR IS TOURS ITINERARY WE OFFER TO VISIT DENPASAR TOURISM SITE AND THEN VISIT TANAH LOT TEMPLE
tagline.text: BALI DENPASAR TANAH LOT TOUR IS TOURS ITINERARY WE OFFER TO VISIT DENPASAR TOURISM SITE AND THEN VISIT TANAH LOT TEMPLE
tagline.html: BALI DENPASAR TANAH LOT TOUR IS TOURS ITINERARY WE OFFER TO VISIT DENPASAR TOURISM SITE AND THEN VISIT TANAH LOT TEMPLE

description.text: Bali Denpasar Tanah Lot Tour is Bali Half Day Tour Packages we make to make your day more impressive by offer Visiting Tourism Site in Denpasar City and then Visiting Tanah Lot Temple. We created something different from other tour company by offer you to visiting two famous regency in half day tour during the Bali Denpasar and Tanah Lot Tour. It is a very interesting half day tour to do, where you can visit the Bajra Sandhi monument where this monument tells the story of the struggle of the island of Bali during the colonial period, with a building shaped like a Genta making the scenery very beautiful, followed by visiting the Mengwi temple called Taman Ayun Temple. is a temple that is very thick with historical value and with a very beautiful design with a fish pond surrounding this temple area, and continued to visit Tanah Lot Temple to see the beauty of the temple that stands on a rock on the beach with the uniqueness if the sea water is big, it will the temple looks like floats and is also very suitable for seeing the beauty of the sunset in this place, enjoy the sunset on the island of the gods, after that proceed to take you back to where you are staying by bringing a very impressive experience in half day Denpasar and Tanah Lot this tour package. This tour will be more fun because it is accompanied by a very experienced tour driver who is friendly in explaining the tour program and driving safely and comfortably

title.title: Bajra Sandhi Monument | Bali Denpasar and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Bajra Sandhi Monument | Bali Denpasar and Tanah Lot Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bajra Sandhi Monument describes the struggle of Balinese people during 5,000 years or from 3,000 BC to 1975 when it started the period of independence. Designed in the form of a Hindu bell, it’s surrounded with lush greenery. This monument is built in the year 1987 and it is opened by president of Megawati Sukarno Putri on 14 June 2003. In its main hall, stone carvings and 33 dioramas depict the country's biggest achievements. Architecturally, the monument reflects the shape of a "gentra" or "bajra," a bell used by Hindu priests in religious ceremonies.
description.html: Bajra Sandhi Monument describes the struggle of Balinese people during 5,000 years or from 3,000 BC to 1975 when it started the period of independence. Designed in the form of a Hindu bell, it’s surrounded with lush greenery. This monument is built in the year 1987 and it is opened by president of Megawati Sukarno Putri on 14 June 2003. In its main hall, stone carvings and 33 dioramas depict the country's biggest achievements. Architecturally, the monument reflects the shape of a "gentra" or "bajra," a bell used by Hindu priests in religious ceremonies.

title.title: Taman Ayun Temple | Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Tanah Lot Tour | Taman Ayun Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Taman Ayun Temple is a historical relic of antiquity and has been included in a protected historical site contained in UNNESCO in 2002 that this temple is included in World Heritage List and has a high historical value, which was previously built by the King of Mengwi, and the design of the Taman Ayun Temple is very good, surrounded fisg pond along the length of the temple, and there are 3 parts areal inside the temple, on the first page there is a large yard with a beautiful garden, on the second page there is yard with a kul-kul (wooden bell) that rings on certain days and on the third page is where the Taman Ayun temple is located.

title.title: Tanah Lot Temple | Bali Denpasar and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Tanah Lot Temple | Bali Denpasar and Tanah Lot Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tanah Lot Temple is one of Bali's most important landmarks, famed for its unique offshore setting and sunset backdrops. An ancient Hindu shrine perched on top of an outcrop amidst constantly crashing waves. The word of Tanah Lot is consisted of two words that are Tanah word interpreted as a reef looking like gili or island. Lot or Lod word has meaning the sea. So Tanah Lot is meaning the small island floating on the sea. The location is now called as Tanah Lot. Extremely popular tourist destination and the whole area is often very busy indeed, especially in the late afternoons, pre-sunset

price.title: Bali Denpasar and Tanah Lot Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Denpasar and Tanah Lot Tour Price :

The tour we provide is Based on Private Tour, We offer two price you can choose which is Regular Tours Price and Inclusive Tours Price, Please see below the details of Bali Denpasar and Tanah Lot Tour Packages price :

Regular Tours Price :

IDR 450,000/car ( 1 till 6 person included)
IDR 850,000/minibus ( 1 till 12 person included)
IDR 1,150,000/minibus ( 1 till 17 person included)
IDR 2,500,000/bus ( 1 till 30 person included)
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + English Speaking Driver
Note : Parking Fee, Entrance fee and Lunch is not include in the price

Or

Inclusive Tours Price :

IDR 550,000/person
Note : For Inclusive Price is minimun Booking 2 Person
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + Parking Fee + English Speaking Driver + Entrance Fee + Mineral Water

itinerary.title: Bali Denpasar and Tanah Lot Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Visit Bajra Shandi Monument
Visit Taman Ayun Temple
Visit Tanah Lot Temple

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • Regular Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price without include lunch and entrance fee, you need to pay by your own self
  • Inclusive Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price with include lunch and entrance fee
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
